title: Statistics 216 [High-Dimensional Probability] Notes
detailed_description: These are my personal notes for Harvard's Statistics 216 course on high-dimensional probability, taught by Subhabrata Sen in Fall 2024. This course is based on material from Vershynin and Van Handel's respective books on high-dimensional probability, covering topics such as concentration results, random matrices, and applications to statistics and machine learning.
description: Notes on Harvard's Statistics 216 course on high-dimensional probability, taught by Subhabrata Sen.
